alert.note: Alert for Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gosper County through 415 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 22 miles southeast of Curtis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elwood, Bertrand and Smithfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
